item.title: Vapor template app
item.description: Vapor A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…I used Kitura to try out Swift on server. Simultaneously other frameworks were developed like Perfect and Vapor. At That time it was mostly alpha/beta versions or work in progress, it wasn’t as pleasurable as using Swift on machines with Apple sign. Recently I decided to go back to that idea and Vapor is what I choose to test. So what is Vapor and from where did it came.
